Welcome to Goverment Polytechnic Aurai, This Institute is best for CS IT And Elx But There Field are not so good but Welcome to World of python there is some changes in new syllubus but few student were know them but there is always gaurd
Katehara, Aurai S.R. Nagar Bhadohi U.P. India, 221301

Goverment Polytechnic Aurai located at Katehara,SR Nagar Bhadohi 221301. Its a Goverment institute Approved By:(AICTE) All India Council of Technical Education Affiliated To: Uttar Pradesh Board of Technical Education. The Institute established in 2010. In this time institute available for only 3 branches (CS, IT, Elx). The other facilities included seprate hostels for boys and girls, extensive libraries,seminar hall,reading hall,outdoor and indoor sports grounds. Our College provides homely,healthy, vegetarian food for all hosteler students.
Our Facilities

\"Imparting knowledge in the most hi-tech enviromrnt\". \n \nThe College of GPA have well equipped Lab. Our College has two well equiped Computer Lab .GPA Campus where many PCs are inter-connected to the internet through broadband Connection GPA Campus have state-of-the-art computer centers that provide computing facilities comprising of the latest HP/IBM/DELL/HCL/ machines linked to a wide range of software ,communication services. Campus are Fully Wi-Fi and student in many programmers are provided with wireless laptops to help them access the world anytime,anywhere.
